comments:
Connection refused error (IWAT4039E) when launching a manual test on Linux with security enabled.

Using the TPTP-4.3.0-200611070100 driver, launching a manual test on Linux (old Agent Controller) with security enabled (Windows XP --> SUSE Linux x86), causes the follow exception on the first launch ONLY:

IWAT4039E The Test Execution Harness reported the following problems:Connection refused on host paules.

org.eclipse.hyades.execution.core.DaemonConnectException
at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl._connect(NodeImpl.java:225)
at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl.connect(NodeImpl.java:360)
at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl.connect(NodeImpl.java:347)
at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness$4.run(TestExecutionHarness.java:2430)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:788)
Caused by: org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.InactiveProcessException
at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ProcessImpl.getProcessId(ProcessImpl.java:497)
at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl._connect(NodeImpl.java:220)
... 4 more

Note, the firewall, user account and password were not an issue with this defect.

Potentially the same issue as https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=160468.
This defect cannot be consistently reproduced but does occur periodically on the first execution.
Is it using the IBM JRE 1.5 SR3 on both client and RAC?
Cannot reproduce using IBM JRE 1.5.0 SR3 on both RAC and workbench. Please verify and reopen if problem still exist using the JRE specified.

(In reply to comment #2)
> Is it using the IBM JRE 1.5 SR3 on both client and RAC?

After re-testing with the IBM 1.5 SR3 JRE on the same machines, I cannot reproduce this defect.

Closing.
